channel.title: Welcome Faraz from Radstakes as a moderator on RadixTalk
channel.description:
I’m very happy to announce that @Faraz, who runs the [Radstakes](https://explorer.radixdlt.com/#/validators/rv1qdzgjh98d4mexymc492eq82zwmspmh9mlz4wqgswta4jcaw0nnwuj53mj5w) validator and [Radstakes.com](https://www.radstakes.com/) website, has joined as a moderator on the RadixTalk forum.
Most of us know Faraz from the excellent job he already does moderating the [Radix DLT Discord](https://discord.gg/radixdlt) forum and [Radix DLT Official Telegram](https://t.me/radix_dlt) channel. We are very grateful that he will bring his experience and expertise to the RadixTalk forum.

item.title: Welcome Faraz from Radstakes as a moderator on RadixTalk
item.dc:creator: Stuart | RadixPool
item.description:
I’m very happy to announce that @Faraz, who runs the Radstakes validator and Radstakes.com website, has joined as a moderator on the RadixTalk forum.

Most of us know Faraz from the excellent job he already does moderating the Radix DLT Discord forum and Radix DLT Official Telegram channel. We are very grateful that he will bring his experience and expertise to the RadixTalk forum.

Read full topic
item.source: Welcome Faraz from Radstakes as a moderator on RadixTalk
